title: Building a set
creator_credit: Wesley Greene, International Film Bureau, Robert Edmonds and Betty Edmonds
brief_description: From the designer’s plans, the carpenter and back stage crew build the set. Drawing an outline on the stage floor (so rehearsals can go on), the crew order material, build flats and complete platforms and other details.
creator_credit_for_label: Wesley Greene, International Film Bureau, Robert Edmonds and Betty Edmonds
